(6/6)

What did this mean for $BEETS holders?

A 197% price and a 223% Market Cap growth in the month.

On the Treasury:

Protocol Owned Liquidity grew thanks to the trading fees captures and our bonding program with @OlympusDAO. This is a little over $550k in non-BEETS assets

(5/6 )

The Top Fees earners were:

- Fantom of the Opera  ($483k)
- When two become 100 ($360k)
 - Fantom Conservatory ($281k)
 - WAGMI ($198k)
 - Song of Ice and Fire (189k)

(4/6) https://t.co/OLmlHo2Udx

What did this mean for us?

 - TVL grew by 177% in the month closing at $268m
 - 738k swap were booked in the month, up 93% from 
    Dec
 - Volume for the month was $1.66 bn, up 318% from 
    Dec
 - $2m of swap fees were collected, up 229% from 
    Dec

The month also saw implementations to further add value to our $fBEETS holders
